item.title: So Your Class Has Been Moved Fully Online
item.description: Please note that this course website is equipped with the Hypothes.is annotation layer. If you are not on the list or you’re listed in the wrong place, please highlight the relevant text and leave an annotation in our class Hypothesis group to alert me. Contingency Plan Here’s the plan: continue to maintain devlogs for the rest of the term. I was looking for 10, remember.

item.title: Using Academic Kickstarter to Deliver a Slide Show
item.description: Please note that this course website is equipped with the Hypothes.is annotation layer. If you are not on the list or you’re listed in the wrong place, please highlight the relevant text and leave an annotation in our class Hypothesis group to alert me. Online Slidedecks Slidedecks or presentations don’t have to be complex. You can make them using nothing but a text file. There are a lot of advantages to doing things this way, but what I really like is that it makes sharing slides super easy - no downloads, no stupid Microsoft Powerpoint faffing around.
